dt: {bc}a substitution of one form of payment or charge for another

dt.t: a {wi}commutation{/wi} by money payment for the exacted service

dt: {bc}a change of a legal penalty or punishment to a lesser one

dt.t: … a ridge of hills makes daily {wi}commutation{/wi} to San Francisco arduous.

et: Middle English {it}commutacion{/it}, from Anglo-French, from Latin {it}commutation-, commutatio{/it}, from {it}commutare{/it}
shortdef: replacement; specifically : a substitution of one form of payment or charge for another
a change of a legal penalty or punishment to a lesser one
